Package com.rb.nonbiz.json

Class RBJsonObjectBuilder

java.lang.Object
com.rb.nonbiz.json.RBJsonObjectBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
RBBuilder<com.google.gson.JsonObject>
public class RBJsonObjectBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
implements RBBuilder<com.google.gson.JsonObject>
A fluent builder for constructing a JsonObject, also with functionality for conditional addition of property/value pairs.

Beyond the fluent style, another advantage is that the setters throw an exception if you set a property more than once, as this is almost always an error.

  • Method Summary

      public RBJsonObjectBuilder setIfNonEmpty​(java.lang.String property, com.google.gson.JsonObject jsonSubObject)
      Adds { property : jsonSubObject } to jsonObject if jsonSubObject is non-empty. Throws if property already exists in jsonObject.

    • setArray

      public RBJsonObjectBuilder setArray​(java.lang.String property, com.google.gson.JsonArray jsonSubArray)
      Adds { property : jsonSubArray } to jsonObject. Throws if property already exists in jsonObject. This is very simple but it allows us to add stuff fluently, which makes the code shorter.

    • sanityCheckContents

      public void sanityCheckContents()
      Description copied from interface: RBBuilder
      Throw an exception if the contents are not OK for building a real object (e.g. fields missing, fields inconsistent with each other, etc.)
      Specified by:
      sanityCheckContents in interface RBBuilder<com.google.gson.JsonObject>

    • buildWithoutPreconditions

      public com.google.gson.JsonObject buildWithoutPreconditions()
      Description copied from interface: RBBuilder
      Sometimes when testing we need to create partial objects for convenience, without checking that all fields are valid - e.g. some may be left unspecified altogether.
      Specified by:
      buildWithoutPreconditions in interface RBBuilder<com.google.gson.JsonObject>

    • buildAsOptionalOrEmpty

      public java.util.Optional<com.google.gson.JsonObject> buildAsOptionalOrEmpty()
      Returns Optional.of(the JSON object in this builder), or Optional.empty if the jsonObject is empty. This is not part of the RBBuilder interface, because not all objects have a concept of being empty, like JsonObject does.

      public com.google.gson.JsonObject getJsonObject()
